üé• On May 21st, I went to Spain for over three weeks. In the first week, I went for some soul-searching in a retreat in the mountains near M√°laga and it was my plan to continue my trip through Andalucia for two or three more weeks, to learn some kitesurfing, Latin dancing, tasting amazing food, and to meet some new people. Want to find out what I ended up doing? Watch this video! ;-)
